Articles.Content: Im new to kerbal and downloaded the KW Rocketry and a few more mods but they are not showing up in game. Where am I supposed to be putting these addons? What folder?

GameData unless its pre-.20 in which case you probably shouldn't use it. .21 caused many issues with mods. Some .20 stuff is ok but if you're new you should probably stick with mods that are .21 ready. I'm not sure if KW has been updated.

Edited August 1, 2013 by DChurchill

You should put them in the GameData folder in your KSP install. If you installed KW Rocketry, then your folder should contain two folders: Squad and KW Rocketry. Good luck, and welcome to the dark side!
Make sure the mods have been updated to 0.21
